channel.title: Road Race - August 26th
channel.description:
Well, I thought I'd share this, because on the August 26th, I am doing my first ever road race.
I've had a turn around, I guess. Where I kind of want to go towards road racing. Good thing now, as you have to be 13 or older to do road racing... It's soo cool, I got my first road bike and all my leathers and armor etc. 2 months ago. I just hope my road racing license comes before August 26th haha. Well, going to be soooo fun.

item.title: Road Race - August 26th
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

It would be even more fun if you talked to l33t master Pookey71
